meanings.sent1: She spent her summer missionizing in remote villages.
meanings.sent2: The group of volunteers will be missionizing in the community next week.
meanings.sent3: The young girl pretended to be missionizing her stuffed animals.
meanings.sent4: The chef was missionizing the kitchen, preparing delicious meals for the event.
meanings.sent5: The students were missionizing the school garden, planting flowers and vegetables.

meanings.definition: The act of attempting to convert others to a particular belief or religion.
meanings.sent1: The missionizing of the tribe was met with curiosity and skepticism.
meanings.sent2: She was passionate about the missionizing of new members to the club.
meanings.sent3: The missionizing of the squirrels to join the bird feeder club was unsuccessful.
meanings.sent4: His persuasive skills were like a powerful tool for missionizing people to his cause.
meanings.sent5: The missionizing of the students to join the environmental club was successful.
